CSS Components
  • Avatar

# Avatar

사용자 계정 썸네일

# Examples

박
Y

# Code

<div class="avatar">
  <img src="http://via.placeholder.com/40x40" alt="">
</div>

<div class="avatar avatar-circle">
  <img src="http://via.placeholder.com/40x40" alt="">
</div>

<div class="avatar">
  <div class="text">박</div>
</div>

<div class="avatar avatar-circle">
  <div class="text">Y</div>
</div>

.avatar {
  $size: 40px;
  $border-radius: 10px;
  $bg-color: #eee;

  width: $size;
  height: $size;
  border-radius: $border-radius;
  background-color: $bg-color;
  overflow: hidden;

  &-circle {
    border-radius: 50%;
  }

  img {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .text {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    line-height: $size;
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 20px;
  }
}
